transcript.text: Let’s look at some every-day situations. Are these people putting personal data at risk?

contentText.text: Which of the following could be risks to data privacy?

contentBackground.img: Busy office, employee working on computer

instructionText.text: Select all the scenarios you believe put personal data at risk.
Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.

extraInstructionText.text: There may be more than one correct answer.

optionContent.option: Using the same password in two places
Posting a picture from a team meeting with the whiteboard in the background on social media
Discussing financial information with a client on the phone in public

correct.text: All of these examples pose a risk to the privacy of your data.
